page.title: 15Cultural Groups in Uxbridge
page.content: There are many different religions in Uxbridge.In our Infant School, (Whitehall)we have Christian,Muslim, Sikh,Hindu and Jehovahs Witness.There is a Mosque but Sikh and Hindu have to go to Southall to their Temple,but sometimes they keep a room in their house for worship.Below are some comments from some of our seven year old children. ,, I go to Sunday School...I have story about Jesus and I do a picture,,. ,, At Eid we get alot of money and I wear beautiful clothes.We go to the Mosque.Everybody gives money as Charity and women wear Mendhi on their hands and men wear perfume,,.
